pullrequest.title: Team Tang fix the docker bug.

content.raw: The names should be “scan” and “scan\_and\_dock” as it’s described in the Task Description document. Note that the task 5 name is a bit misleading but that document is what you should follow. If we change this name, we’ll let all teams know. Could you update your Docker image to reflect that change in the task 5 and let me know?
content.html: The names should be “scan” and “scan_and_dock” as it’s described in the Task Description document. Note that the task 5 name is a bit misleading but that document is what you should follow. If we change this name, we’ll let all teams know. Could you update your Docker image to reflect that change in the task 5 and let me know?
